name: iPhone 14 Pro Max
description: The iPhone 14 Pro Max features Apple's A16 Bionic chip, a 48MP main camera, and an always-on display with Dynamic Island.

name: iPhone 13
description: The iPhone 13 features an A15 Bionic chip, improved battery life, and enhanced camera system with Cinematic mode.

name: Samsung Galaxy S23 Ultra
description: The Galaxy S23 Ultra features a built-in S Pen, powerful Snapdragon 8 Gen 2 processor, and a 200MP main camera.

name: Samsung Galaxy A53 5G
description: The Galaxy A53 5G offers a 120Hz display, 64MP quad camera, and 5G connectivity at a mid-range price.

name: Oppo Find X5 Pro
description: The Oppo Find X5 Pro features Hasselblad-tuned cameras, Snapdragon 8 Gen 1 processor, and 80W SuperVOOC charging.

name: Oppo Reno 7
description: The Oppo Reno 7 features a sleek design, 64MP triple camera, and 33W fast charging capability.

name: Vivo X80 Pro
description: The Vivo X80 Pro features Zeiss optics, Snapdragon 8 Gen 1, and advanced camera capabilities with V1+ imaging chip.

name: Vivo Y73
description: The Vivo Y73 offers a slim design, 64MP main camera, and fast charging at an affordable price point.

name: Xiaomi 12 Pro
description: The Xiaomi 12 Pro features a 120Hz AMOLED display, Snapdragon 8 Gen 1, and triple 50MP camera system.

name: Redmi Note 11
description: The Redmi Note 11 offers a 90Hz AMOLED display, 50MP quad camera, and fast charging capabilities at a budget price.

name: OnePlus 11
description: The OnePlus 11 features Hasselblad cameras, Snapdragon 8 Gen 2, and incredibly fast 100W charging.

name: OnePlus Nord CE 2
description: The OnePlus Nord CE 2 offers a 90Hz AMOLED display, fast charging, and solid performance at a mid-range price.

name: Nothing Phone (1)
description: The Nothing Phone (1) features a unique transparent design with Glyph Interface LEDs and a clean user experience.

name: Nothing Phone (2)
description: The Nothing Phone (2) builds upon the original with improved Glyph Interface, better performance, and enhanced cameras.

name: Motorola Edge 30 Ultra
description: The Motorola Edge 30 Ultra features a 200MP camera, Snapdragon 8+ Gen 1, and incredibly fast 125W charging.

name: Motorola Moto G Power
description: The Motorola Moto G Power offers exceptional battery life with its 5000mAh battery and solid performance at an affordable price.

name: iQOO 11
description: The iQOO 11 features a Snapdragon 8 Gen 2 processor, 144Hz E6 AMOLED display, and 120W fast charging.

name: iQOO Z6
description: The iQOO Z6 offers 5G connectivity, 120Hz display, and 80W FlashCharge technology at a mid-range price point.

name: Lava Agni 5G
description: The Lava Agni 5G is India's first 5G smartphone with a 64MP quad camera, MediaTek Dimensity 810, and fast charging.

name: Lava Blaze Pro
description: The Lava Blaze Pro offers a 50MP camera, glass back design, and decent performance at a budget-friendly price.

name: Nokia X30 5G
description: The Nokia X30 5G features a PureView 50MP camera, eco-friendly recycled materials, and 3 years of OS updates.

name: Nokia G21
description: The Nokia G21 offers 3-day battery life, 50MP triple camera, and 2 years of Android updates at an affordable price.

name: Samsung Galaxy Book3 Pro
description: Samsung Galaxy Book3 Pro features a 13th Gen Intel Core i7 processor, AMOLED display, and ultra-slim design.

name: Samsung Galaxy Book2
description: Samsung Galaxy Book2 offers a lightweight design, Intel Core i5 processor, and fast SSD storage.

name: HP Spectre x360 14
description: HP Spectre x360 14 is a premium 2-in-1 laptop with a 13th Gen Intel Core i7, OLED touch display, and long battery life.

name: HP Pavilion 15
description: HP Pavilion 15 is a versatile laptop with 12th Gen Intel Core i5, FHD display, and fast SSD storage.

name: Samsung Galaxy Tab S8 Ultra
description: Samsung Galaxy Tab S8 Ultra features a massive 14.6-inch Super AMOLED display, S Pen support, and a powerful Snapdragon 8 Gen 1 processor.

name: Samsung Galaxy Tab A8
description: Samsung Galaxy Tab A8 offers a 10.5-inch display, quad speakers, and a large battery for entertainment and productivity.

name: OnePlus Pad
description: OnePlus Pad features an 11.61-inch 144Hz display, MediaTek Dimensity 9000, and a large 9510mAh battery.

name: OnePlus Pad Go
description: OnePlus Pad Go is a budget-friendly tablet with an 11.35-inch 2.4K display and a large battery for all-day use.

name: Xiaomi Pad 6
description: Xiaomi Pad 6 features an 11-inch 2.8K 144Hz display, Snapdragon 870, and a slim metal body.

name: Redmi Pad
description: Redmi Pad is a value-for-money tablet with a 10.61-inch 2K display, MediaTek Helio G99, and a large battery.

name: Motorola Moto Tab G70
description: Moto Tab G70 features an 11-inch 2K display, MediaTek Helio G90T, and a sturdy metal body.

name: Motorola Moto Tab G20
description: Moto Tab G20 is a compact and affordable tablet with an 8-inch HD+ display and a lightweight design.

name: Xiaomi Smart TV X Series 55
description: Xiaomi Smart TV X Series 55 features a 4K UHD display, Dolby Vision, and PatchWall with Android TV.

name: Xiaomi Smart TV 5A 43
description: Xiaomi Smart TV 5A 43 offers Full HD resolution, powerful 24W speakers, and Android TV with PatchWall.

name: Mi TV 5X 50
description: Mi TV 5X 50 features a 4K HDR display, Dolby Vision, and 40W stereo speakers for immersive viewing.

name: Mi TV 4A Horizon 40
description: Mi TV 4A Horizon 40 offers a bezel-less Full HD display, DTS-HD audio, and PatchWall with Android TV.

name: NVW Ultra HD Smart TV 50
description: NVW Ultra HD Smart TV 50 offers a 4K UHD display, smart connectivity, and powerful sound output.

name: NVW HD Ready TV 32
description: NVW HD Ready TV 32 is a compact TV with HD Ready resolution, HDMI/USB connectivity, and clear sound.

name: Cellecor 4K Smart TV 43
description: Cellecor 4K Smart TV 43 features a 4K UHD display, smart TV apps, and immersive audio.

name: Cellecor HD Ready TV 32
description: Cellecor HD Ready TV 32 is an affordable TV with HD Ready resolution, HDMI/USB ports, and good sound.

name: Zebronics Zeb-Thunder Wireless
description: Zebronics Zeb-Thunder is a wireless Bluetooth speaker with deep bass, FM radio, and long battery life.

name: Zebronics Zeb-County
description: Zebronics Zeb-County is a portable Bluetooth speaker with built-in FM, USB, and microSD support.

name: JBL Flip 6
description: JBL Flip 6 is a portable Bluetooth speaker with powerful sound, deep bass, and IP67 waterproof rating.

name: JBL Go 3
description: JBL Go 3 is an ultra-portable Bluetooth speaker with bold sound and stylish design.

name: Ultra Prolink Boom 10
description: Ultra Prolink Boom 10 is a portable wireless speaker with deep bass and 10W output.

name: Ultra Prolink UPL Sound Drum
description: Ultra Prolink UPL Sound Drum is a compact Bluetooth speaker with stereo sound and built-in mic.

name: Edifier R1280T
description: Edifier R1280T is a bookshelf speaker with studio sound quality and dual RCA input.

name: Edifier MP200
description: Edifier MP200 is a portable Bluetooth speaker with microSD support and splash-proof design.

name: Digitek DBS-011
description: Digitek DBS-011 is a portable Bluetooth speaker with 10W output and TWS function.

name: Digitek DBS-021
description: Digitek DBS-021 is a rugged Bluetooth speaker with 12W output, splash-proof design, and long battery life.

name: boAt Stone 1200
description: boAt Stone 1200 is a portable Bluetooth speaker with RGB lights, 14W output, and IPX7 waterproof rating.

name: boAt Stone Grenade
description: boAt Stone Grenade is a compact Bluetooth speaker with rugged design and 7 hours of playtime.
